name: Streamline Icons Free Pack
description:
Update: An overnight success is ten years in the making. Our elements file got nominated as the best graphic design resource for Figma and I'd love for you to check it out and please vote. â™¥

~ Vincent Le Moign


--


A free sample of the original Streamline icon sets which contains 40,000+ icons in 3 massive sets.


Streamline Light

  • The classic iOS line icon style, with enough details and a thin line stroke.
  • 1px stroke on a 24px grid.
  • 13,907 vector Icons in 55 categories


Streamline Regular:

  • A minimal and geometric line style. The right balance between legibility and minimalism.
  • 1.5px stroke on a 24px grid.
  • 12,826 vector Icons in 55 categories


Streamline Bold:

  • A solid style for easy recognition. Bold and great to use with colors.
  • 2px stroke on a 24px grid.
  • 14,759 vector icons in 55 categories.


You can customize vector line width or vector path, which is amazing if you like full control over your icons.
